games.title: Rise of the Dead
games.description: Dive into the intense universe of Rise of the Dead, a post-apocalyptic city filled with undead. As a brave survivor, your goal is to reclaim territories, eliminate zombies, and rescue others. Enjoy this free online game on your phone or computer, testing your strategy and combat abilities.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:  
    Movement:  Arrow keys (W A S D)  
    Shoot:  left click 
    Reload:  R  
    Punch:  E
    Change weapon: Q
    Use prop 1:  G
    Use prop 2: F
    Zoom: Scrollbar

Mobile Controls:  
    Movement:  Virtual Joystick [Joystick Image]  
    Actions:  Tap corresponding buttons

games.title: Zombie Derby
games.description: Zombie Derby is a wild mix of racing and zombie mayhem from Brinemedia. Jump behind the wheel and plow through hordes of the undead standing in your way. But be careful - your fuel is limited, and once you stop, you‚Äôll become easy prey. Time your nitro boosts wisely, as they might be the only thing that gets you over a hill or across a deadly gap.
games.howToPlayText:
Accelerate - W/Arrow up
Shoot gun - Spacebar
Use nitro - Left Shift/N
Tilt forward/backward - Left/Right arrow or A/D

games.title: One Man Army: Battle Game
games.description: One Man Army: A casual single player Battle Game that will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.
games.howToPlayText:
Are you ready for the fun challenge in this defensive battle strategy game? One Man Army: Battle Game puts you in the shoes of an unstoppable warrior defending yourself and testing your reflexes against enemy attacks. With a variety of skills and upgrades at your disposal, you can upgrade your armory and become an unstoppable force.

As a One Man Army, you must use your battle tactics to defend and survive enemy attacks. The game tests your reflexes and strategic skills as you face wave after wave of enemy soldier's attacks. You must be quick on your feet, using the right tactics to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.

With each battle won you earn points to rank up, upgrade your armory and enhance your battle skills. Armory upgrades include everything from new weapons and armor to protective gear and shields. By climbing up the ranks you claim them all to be a champion battle warrior.

One Man Army: Battle Game will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.

The game features easy Battle game mechanics and realistic sound effects, immersing you to test your reflexes and battle tactics in this challenging game. You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre on the front lines of the battlefield action, and defending against enemy attack with every move you make.

One Man Army: Battle Game is the perfect game for anyone who loves a challenge. Are you ready to rule the battlefield and emerge victorious? Play One Man Army: Battle Game now and find out!

games.title: Zombie Space Episode II
games.description:
NEW ISSUE OF GALACTIC NEWS

ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE ON THE RED PLANET...
- Zombie virus has spread among civilians.
- Rescuers found survivors among the zombies.
- The galactic government has urgently gone on vacation.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
A zombie virus outbreak has occurred on the space station. The first group of mercenaries disappeared. Your task is to find survivors among the zombies and find out the cause of the zombie apocalypse. You have to fight a horde of zombies using various types of weapons. Look for hidden weapons in chests. Upgrade characters and weapons! Use the abilities of the characters in hot battles against zombies. Play with a friend on the same device or solo!
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

games.title: Frost Land - Snow Survival
games.description: Frost Land - Snow Survival is a strategic base-building game where you battle the harsh cold to stay alive. You‚Äôll wield a flamethrower to melt snow, uncover hidden resources, and expand your shelter. Every choice matters‚Äîmanage supplies wisely and decide which frozen zones to explore as you carve out survival in a relentless winter.In the strategic realm of a winter survival game, a devastating catastrophe has plunged the world into an endless winter. Embodying the last surviving hero, you venture forth, armed with a formidable flamethrower. Battle against relentless winter weather, confront fearsome beasts, and forge alliances with fellow survivors you rescue.With immersive exploration, strategic resource management, and a thrilling quest for survival, Frost Land ‚Äì Snow Survival offers an addictive and adrenaline-pumping gameplay experience that will keep you hooked in the snow game for hours on end.Featuresüó∫Ô∏è Epic Exploration: Brace yourself for an immersive winter survival journey through a visually stunning snowy world, where uncovering hidden resources with your badass flamethrower will keep you on the edge of your seat.‚öîÔ∏è Strategy Resource Mastery: It's all about strategic thinking and resource management in a base-building game. Carefully decide when and where to melt that icy snow to unveil precious resources. It ensures your winter survival and dominance in this unforgiving realm.üè∞ Base-Building Awesomeness: Customize and upgrade your base. Show off your creativity and build a base that strikes fear into the hearts of your rivals.‚ùÑÔ∏è Weather Challenges and Beast Battles: Brace yourself for intense weather conditions like blizzards and freezing winds that will test your winter survival skills.üéØ Quests and Triumphs: Embark on thrilling quests and conquer objectives that shower you with epic rewards and unlock new adventures. Prove yourself as a true hero of the winter survival game and make your mark in this frozen game.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:
W/‚Üë (Up Arrow): Move forward.
S/‚Üì (Down Arrow): Move backward.
A/‚Üê (Left Arrow): Move left.
D/‚Üí (Right Arrow): Move right.

Mobile Controls:
On-Screen Joystick: Move in all directions by dragging the joystick.

games.title: A Long Way Home
games.description: A Long Way Home is a chilling survival horror game that plunges you into the role of a lost wanderer, desperately trying to find their way back home. Stranded in an eerie, ever-changing landscape, you must navigate through shadowy corridors and odd places while being relentlessly pursued by strange, otherworldly creatures. As reality begins to unravel, you'll encounter haunting visions and unsettling experiences that blur the line between fear and madness. Will you uncover the truth behind your nightmarish journey or succumb to the horrors lurking in the dark? Prepare for a gripping tale of survival, mystery, and terror in A Long Way Home.
games.howToPlayText:
You're a lost wanderer.

Explore the haunted world using Arrows or WASD.

Use your mouse to control the camera

Find hidden notes that expand the universe.

Collect all the hidden Foxes.

games.title: Echolocation Shooter
games.description:
Shoot to see in the dark!

Eliminate all the neon enemies, in the horroristic level!

The only way to see in this FPS is to generate soundwave with your weapon.

Survive endless waves of the wide variety of neon monster enemies, where the only way to see is to shoot.
Unleash soundwave rifles, laser cannons, and grenades to light up the battlefield, upgrade your gear, and fight deeper into the horroristic horde.

Every shot reveals the world‚Äîevery wave pushes your limits.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Movement: Arrows, A, W, S, D
Jump: Space
Dodge: Shift

Interact with environment: Left-click

Generate Soundwave: Left-click
Activate Weapon: Right-click
Shoot: Right-click

Change Weapon: 1, 2, Mouse-scroll
Grenade: G

Menu: P

Mobile:
Buttons

games.title: Escape From Squid Island
games.description: Dive into this thrilling 3D shooter, "Escape from Squid Island," where you must flee a dangerous island filled with enemies. Enjoy intense battles, varied environments, and an engaging plot on your device. Prepare for an exhilarating experience as you fight for your freedom!
games.howToPlayText:
- Use WASD to control your character
- Rotate the mouse to control the camera
- Click the left mouse button to shoot
- Click the right mouse button to aim
- Press R to recharge

games.title: Desolate Isle: Survival
games.description: Survive and escape from a mysterious island in this open-world survival adventure game. Gather resources, craft tools, build your base, and explore new areas with unique materials and challenges. Complete quests to unlock new territories and uncover the secrets of the island. Perfect for fans of survival, exploration, and crafting games.
games.howToPlayText:
Universal:
Interaction with objects happens automatically when you get close enough. However, some objects require you to press the button that appears above them to interact.

Keyboard :
Move - WASD or Left/Right/Up/Down arrow keys  

Mobile 
Move and turn - use joystick

games.title: War V: Path of the Survivor!
games.description:
War Z: Path of the Survivor! - Story-driven first-person shooter. Go through the story, buy weapons, install various modules on them.

A first-person action shooter.

As a result of the man-made disaster, most of humanity was infected with a dangerous virus... which turns people into zombies

The survivors were forced to form paramilitary groups...

Who knows, maybe it's up to you to find the antidote to the virus and save humanity...

- The world of the zombie apocalypse.
- An exciting storyline.
- Hordes of zombies from the simplest to the mutated.
- A variety of weapons from the real world.
- Various weapon modules and a leveling system.
games.howToPlayText:
Control:
- WASD - movement,
- LSHIFT - switch to running,
- SPACEBAR - jump.
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot,
- RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - aim,
- T - inspect the weapons.
- R - reload.

games.title: Abandoned Mansion
games.description:
Abandoned Mansion is a first-person horror game set in an abandoned mansion, where a distress call leads you to investigate. Upon arrival, you realize it‚Äôs too late.
The game features item interaction, challenging puzzles, and terrifying monsters.

Features:

Optimized 3D graphics and realistic sound effects
Immersive and thrilling music
Multiple levels to test your skills
Variety of enemy types
Boss fights
Puzzles to solve
Exploration of the abandoned building
Hidden rooms and items
"Abandoned Mansion" will test your courage and survival skills. Can you unravel the mansion's mystery and face its monstrous inhabitants? Play now to find out.
games.howToPlayText:
W, A, S, D - Move
E - Interact
R - Reload
C - Crouch
Tab - Open inventory
Space - Jump
Left mouse button - Attack/Shoot

games.title: Skyblock 3D: Survival
games.description: Embark on a unique survival adventure on floating islands in a 3D world, where each island offers valuable resources. Explore vibrant landscapes, battle monsters to grow stronger, and trade with villagers for useful items. Build plantations and breed animals to ensure a steady supply of food and resources. The skies are full of islands, each one holding secrets and challenges. Survive, craft, battle, and thrive in this exciting world!
games.howToPlayText:
For computer:
- Move: W, A, S, D
- Jump: Spacebar
- Break blocks: Hold down LMB
- Place blocks: RMB / F
- Inventory: E
- Pause: Tab
- Help: J
- Drop: Q (Shift+Q Drop full slot)

For mobile devices:
- Move: Left Joystick
- Jump: Arrow icon button
- Break blocks: Hold down the sword icon button.
- Stack blocks: Hold down the cross icon button.
- Inventory: Orange button in the middle of the screen.
- Pause: Purple button in the upper right corner of the screen

games.title: Pulse Of Fear
games.description:
Trapped in an abandoned place where something unspeakable lives, your survival depends on two things: light and silence.

Fuel your flashlight with batteries to shed light on the eerie secrets of the place. Repair generators to restore power and find a way to escape. Search for items: fuses for electrical panels, first aid kits for healing, and keys to locked doors.

Light the way. Fix the system. Start the elevator. Most importantly, stay in the shadows.
games.howToPlayText:
Search generators, activate they. Change fuse, Cut wires and more. Hide from monsters - use beds or lockers
Desktop controls:
Movement: WASD
Look: Mouse
Run: Shift
Action: E
Flashlight: F
Pause: Tab
Drop Item: Q
Inventory: 1,2,3,4,5

Mobile Controls:
Movement: Joystick on Screen
Look: Touch Zone
Run button: Press for run
Action button: Tap for use 
Flashlight button: Activate Flashlight
Pause: Button for pause game
Drop Button: Drop item
Inventory: Change Items

games.title: 99 Nights In The Forest - Survival Simulator
games.description:
99 Nights In The Forest - Survival Simulator - Go on outings, get food and resources, fight monsters and find the missing children!

What is in the game:

3 locations filled with both peaceful creatures and hostile ones! And also chests and resources!

The ability to save children by destroying secret bosses!

The skin merchant's store, where you can buy various upgrades!

The ability to earn achievements. For each achievement, you will receive DIAMONDS.
games.howToPlayText:
Click on "Hike" and select a location.
Attack - click when the "triangle" is over the center of the attack bar.
Defense - hold to stop the heart, release to move it in the other direction.

games.title: Road Madness
games.description: If you like race cars and guns, you will love this game! You can upgrade and unlock more destructive cars, the further you get. Enjoy epic effects and power ups while hunting the new bosses and get achievements for it!
games.howToPlayText: Shoot enemy cars and upgrade your gear to survive in higher levels. Avoid obstacles and gather power ups from destroyed special enemies. Defeat bosses at the end of levels to progress further

games.title: Zombies vs special forces
games.description:
Zombies vs Special Forces is an online third-person shooter game. 
You will act as special forces and complete the task of clearing the territory from zombies.
The game has three difficulty levels that allow players with different skill levels complete the mission. 
You have full freedom to walkthrough levels of the game.
games.howToPlayText:
- Forward: [W].
- Back: [S].
- Step left: [A].
- Step right: [D].
- Direction: mouse cursor.
- Shoot zombies: left mouse button.

games.title: Noob saves the village
games.description: The village has been attacked by merciless monsters! Become a real hero and defeat dangerous enemies with your fighting skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Moving around on the computer using the keyboard, attacking by pressing the left mouse button. 

Move around on mobile devices using joysticks and attack by clicking on the corresponding button.

games.title: Carvivor Ops
games.description: Carvivor Ops is a car-based action game that challenges you to survive increasingly intense waves of police within a limited time.
games.howToPlayText:
Get behind the wheel of a weaponized supercar !
Dodge the cops, fire rockets Upgrade your gear, survive endless chases, and become the ultimate escape artist!

Desktop Controls:
‚Üë (Up Arrow, W): Move upward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow, S): Move downward.
‚Üê (Left Arrow, A): Move left.
‚Üí (Right Arrow, D): Move right.

Mobile Controls:
Control the car using the buttons on the screen!

games.title: Trap Craft
games.description:
The Hacker is ready to fulfill any desire of a Princess, Noob, Pro, Herobrine and the rest.
He offers them to play a game: if you protect the portal from zombies, then the wish will come true!
Each character has its own funny ending! Find out all of them!

Features of the game Trap craft. Herobrine and Noob vs Hacker

- 6 adventures: Herobrine, Princess, Noob, Pro, Foxy, Imp!
- 12 pets - tame all!
- This is a walkthrough game, not just a mod.
- The main characters have inventory for items
- Unique abilities of weapons
- Different types of monsters: from zombies to Dragons!
- At the levels you will meet Entity 303
- Play together with friendly pets, set traps and fight against the hostile zombies of the cube world.
- Watch video exhibitions - learn the history of Herobrine, Princess, Nubik.
- The best Trap Crafting adventure game - defeat zombies, survive, craft traps, tame pets in a cube world.

And also try our other monster school games!
games.howToPlayText: You need to build a defense of your chosen traps against zombies. By killing zombies, you get coins that you can use to set traps in the way of zombies. Control the hero with the keyboard and mouse.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/trap-craft?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion
games.description: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion is an engaging survival game where you fly on a magic broom, fighting waves of enemies. Play online for free, hone your skills, unlock spells, and upgrade brooms. Choose between practice or endless challenge modes. Experience the captivating adventure and see how long you can endure!
games.howToPlayText:
PC Controls
WASD or Arrows = movement
Space = broom leap / rush
Z = choose to take the first spell
X = choose to take the second spell
C = choose to take the third spell
Mobile Controls
Joystick = movement
Rush Button = leap/ rush

games.title: Bullet Echo
games.description:
Lead your team to victory in this unique PvP tactical team shooter! Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles and abilities. Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends. Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. Unlock and upgrade new heroes, participate in championships, and fight to unlock new perks, maps, and game modes!

Bullet Echo ‚Äî Game Description
Bullet Echo is a tactical, team-based PvP shooter with a unique top-down perspective, developed by ZeptoLab. The game stands out for its stealth-focused gameplay, fast-paced battles, and emphasis on teamwork.

Key Features
Unique Tactical Stealth Action:
Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. This creates suspenseful, strategic encounters where sound and positioning are crucial.

Team Play and Strategy:
Play with friends or match with players worldwide. Unite your team, set a strategy, and be the last team standing. The level of your hero is matched with the highest in your party, making it easy to play with friends of any experience.

Diverse Heroes:
Choose from dozens of different heroes, each with unique play styles, weapons, and abilities. Unlock and upgrade heroes to boost their power and unlock new perks.

Multiple Game Modes:

Battle Royale: Five teams of three players each compete to be the last team standing on a shrinking map.

Team vs Team: Two teams of five players face off on exclusive maps.

King of the Hill: Solo mode with 15 players battling for survival.

Additional modes and maps are available as you progress.

Progression and Rewards:
Participate in championships, accomplish missions, and receive valuable resources. Unlock new heroes, perks, maps, and game modes as you play.

Gameplay Overview
Top-Down Shooter:
The game uses a top-down view, giving players an aerial perspective of the battlefield. Stealth, quick reflexes, and tactical movement are essential.

Auto-Shooting:
Heroes automatically fire when an enemy enters their firing cone, allowing players to focus on movement and positioning.

Looting:
Collect weapons, ammo, armor, and power-ups during matches to enhance your hero‚Äôs abilities.

Revive System:
Teammates can revive each other during battles, adding another layer of teamwork and strategy.
games.howToPlayText:
Main Objectives
Team up with friends or play solo to compete in tactical PvP battles.

Survive and eliminate enemy teams using stealth, strategy, and your hero‚Äôs unique abilities.

Collect loot and power-ups to strengthen your hero during each match.

Be the last team or player standing to win the round.

Desktop Controls (if playing via emulator or official desktop version)
Note: Bullet Echo is primarily a mobile game, but can be played on PC via Android emulators. Controls may vary depending on emulator settings.

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys: Move your hero.

Mouse: Aim your flashlight cone (direction of vision).

Left Mouse Button: Use hero‚Äôs special ability (if mapped).

Spacebar: Interact with objects or revive teammates (if mapped).

Esc: Open game menu or pause.

You can customize key bindings in most emulators for optimal comfort.

Mobile Controls
Virtual Joystick (Left side): Move your hero around the map.

Swipe / Drag (Right side): Aim your flashlight and field of vision.

Ability Button: Tap to activate your hero‚Äôs special ability.

Interact Button: Tap to pick up items, open chests, or revive teammates.

Auto-Shoot: Your hero fires automatically when an enemy enters your cone of vision.

Tips for Success
Use walls and obstacles for cover and to ambush enemies.

Listen for enemy footsteps and gunfire to locate opponents in the fog of war.

Stick with your team for better chances of survival and to revive each other.

Upgrade and experiment with different heroes to find your best play style.

Master the controls and tactics to dominate the arena in Bullet Echo!

games.title: Furry Kung Fu
games.description:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from.
games.howToPlayText:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from
–ö–∞–∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å
Control on the PC: by arrow buttons, on the smartphone - by swipes and taps on the screen.

Swipe: left/right arrow, tap on the screen to the left/right of the player.
Combo: repeatedly pressing the button in the direction where you want to apply a combo / multiple tap to the left or right of the player.
Sit down: down arrow / swipe down.
Jump: arrow up / swipe up.
Double jump (if available for a specific skin): double arrow up / two swipe up

Uppercut - squat and jump, arrow down and up / swipe down and up;
Attack from above - press the down arrow / swipe down while jumping.

The enemies drop weapons and lives. You can pick them up by tapping/tapping in their direction.

The enemy on the ball and comet can be shot down. The rat in the window can be turned off briefly by throwing a weapon at it.
Levels in the Survival game mode are unlocked as you progress through the main Campaign.

games.title: Fortress of the Sinister
games.description: Dive into the thrilling world of *Fortress of the Sinister*, a 3D strategy game filled with tactical gameplay and challenges. Lead a diverse team through intricate fortresses, face enemies in turn-based combat, gather resources, enhance abilities, and uncover secrets in this engaging online adventure for mobile and PC.
games.howToPlayText:
Fortress of Sinister is a groundbreaking 3D strategy game that masterfully blends tactical depth with pulse-pounding challenges. Lead your team of powerful characters through four formidable fortresses, each brimming with unique enemies and obstacles. Outwit your foes in dynamic, turn-based battles set on grid-based arenas, and uncover the secrets lurking within the shadows.

Game Objectives
- Short-term: Win battles with clever tactics and minimal losses.
- Mid-term: Build an elite team to conquer 10 floors in each fortress.
- Long-term: Strengthen your characters to face endless challenges in ultimate survival mode.

Features
- Turn-Based Combat: Engage in tactical battles on arenas of varying sizes, from 3x3 skirmishes to epic 7x7 confrontations.
- Diverse Characters: Recruit unique units like the ‚ÄúMushroom Priest,‚Äù ‚ÄúStone Golem,‚Äù and ‚ÄúNight Hunter,‚Äù each with distinct abilities to amplify your strategy.
- Loot & Progression: Collect treasures, trinkets, and currency after each floor to purchase items and upgrade your team‚Äôs skills.
- Meta-Progression: Unlock new characters and upgrades, ensuring your team is ready for escalating challenges.


- Keyboard
Use the mouse to play the game.
all movement takes place at the expense of the mouse.
You won't need any buttons.
Complete the training at the beginning of the game to figure out exactly how it works.

games.title: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor
games.description: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor ‚Äì A 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Battle the undead, explore vast locations, uncover dark secrets, and fight to survive in a mysterious, deadly new reality.
games.howToPlayText:
Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor  - is an 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world.. Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!


A huge location populated by a wide variety of inhabitants!

The quiet life of the middle lane is disrupted by a mysterious catastrophe ‚Äì an unknown phenomenon turns people into the living dead. The main character finds himself in the epicenter of the tragedy by accident: being away from the city, he learns about the beginning of the apocalypse just two weeks after it began.

Now he has to not only fight for survival in a new, cruel world, but also reveal its secrets. Collecting information bit by bit, he tries to understand the nature of the disaster and its impact on people..

Gameplay Features:

‚Ä¢ Exploring a post-apocalyptic world 
‚Ä¢ Interacting with the few survivors
‚Ä¢ Search for resources and create equipment
‚Ä¢ * Battles with different opponents
‚Ä¢ Thrilling zombie apocalypse storyline
‚Ä¢ Realistic arsenal of weapons

Immerse yourself in the exciting world of the post-apocalypse! Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!

Control:
- WASD - movement,
- LSHIFT - switch to running,
- SPACE - jump.
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot,
- RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - aim,
- MOUSE WHEEL, Q - change weapons.
- T - inspect the weapons.
- R - reload.
- M - map.

games.title: Wasteland Hunter: puzzle RPG
games.description:
Wasteland Hunter: puzzle RPG ‚Äî a unique combination of Tetris puzzle mechanics integrated into a turn-based combat system and RPG strategy set in a post-apocalyptic world.
What makes the game special:

Innovative Combat System: Players use Tetris blocks with equipment (bullets, health packs, shields, grenades) to create devastating combat combinations
Strategic Depth: Turn-based battles require tactical thinking ‚Äî players adapt block formations to enemy types and situations
Meta-Progression: Beyond combat, players rebuild and manage a survivor camp, rescue NPCs, and create unique combat figures from discovered blueprints
High Replayability: Map exploration, escalating difficulty, and diverse equipment ensure long-term engagement
games.howToPlayText:
PC Controls
Use mouse buttons  to play the game.

Mobile Controls
Use in-game buttons to play the game.

Play for free online on multiple devices without registration, making it accessible for all gamers. Enjoy a thrilling, dynamic experience!

games.title: Creepy playtime
games.description: Enter the unsettling realm of Creepy Playtime, where shadows hide lurking threats. Collect soda cans while avoiding detection in this suspenseful game. A haunting voice taunts your every step. Can you escape the monsters, or will they ensnare you? Play this frightening adventure for free online on PC and mobile.
games.howToPlayText:
You woke up backstage, filled with monsters and mysteries! The locals do not like uninvited guests, so its better not to get caught by them. To get out of the backstage, you need to collect soda cans scattered throughout the backstage. But be careful, the monsters behind the scenes are very vigilant! Can you get out? If not, then you will stay there forever!

Controls on PC:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space

Controls on smartphone:
Movement - Left joystick
Turns - Right joystick
Jump - Button

games.title: Ball Attack
games.description: Blast through endless waves of bouncing balls, dodge incoming obstacles, and upgrade your powerful cannon to survive longer in this intense, fast-paced arcade shooter filled with nonstop action and explosive fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag to Move: Slide your finger (or mouse) left and right to control the cannon.
Shoot Automatically: Your cannon fires continuously‚Äîfocus on aiming and dodging!
Destroy Balls: Each ball has a number‚Äîshoot to reduce it to zero and blast it apart.
Dodge Everything: Avoid touching balls or it‚Äôs game over!
Collect Coins: Use coins to upgrade your firepower, speed, and special abilities.
Survive Waves: The longer you last, the tougher (and more rewarding) it gets!

games.title: Mouse Survivor
games.description: Get ready for the thrilling journey of Mouse Survivor! In this dynamic 2D game, you'll dodge dangerous snakes and tackle explosive obstacles while gathering cheese to explore new areas. Stay agile and quick to thrive in this constantly changing environment, available on both mobile and desktop!
games.howToPlayText:
How to play Mouse Survivor?

Keyboard Controls

W  / Arrow Up / Spacebar: Jump
A / Arrow Left:  Left
D / Arrow Right:  Right

For Mobile:Scroll             

üê≠ Run, Jump, and Explore Infinitely Divided Worlds with the Brave Mouse!üßÄ

Embark on an epic journey with our fearless mouse hero in this exciting 2D endless running game! 

üèÉ Endless Running Adventure:
Guide your mouse through a dynamic world full of ever-changing tiles. Watch out for those with lower alpha; One touch can be dangerous! Dodge, jump and slide your way through endless challenges.


üêç Encounter Sneaky Snakes:
Watch out for crawling snakes! Snakes will try to hinder your progress. Swipe right, left or up to perform daring moves and escape their cunning clutches. Can you outsmart the serpentine enemies?


üßÄ Cheese Collection and Upgrades:
Munch on delicious cheeses scattered along the way to increase your cheese count. Acquire new tile types by spending your hard-earned cheeses. Customize your running experience with a variety of tiles, each with its own unique features and challenges!
Good Luck...

games.title: Samurai Survivor
games.description: In the land of ancient Japan, a mysterious portal has opened, unleashing hordes of monstrous creatures into the world. As the last line of defense, a group of brave samurai warriors must stand against the onslaught to protect their homeland. Each warrior possesses unique skills and abilities, handed down through generations, to combat the dark forces. Together, they must fight to close the portal and restore peace to the land.
games.howToPlayText:
Survive hundreds of enemies while leveling up and upgrading your skills.

‚Üë (Up Arrow): Move upward.
‚Üì (Down Arrow): Move downward.
‚Üê (Left Arrow): Move left.
‚Üí (Right Arrow): Move right.
üñ±Ô∏è(Left Click): Move in all directions by dragging your mouse while pressing left click.


Mobile Controls:
Move in all directions by touching the screen.

games.title: Pocket ZONE
games.description:
See the Chernobyl nuclear power plant and realize your innermost dream with the help of the legendary Performer of desires.
Or maybe you just want to get away from the gray and boring life of megacities and just wander through the deserts of the earth, where a person is again left alone with an aggressive environment that dreams of absorbing him?

Features of the game:
‚ò¢ Hardcore real mobile survival system with the best RPG component, inspired by the Fallout and Stalker series.
‚ò¢ Interesting random text events, the outcome of which depends only on your choice and on external factors that directly affect your chances of survival.
‚ò¢ A complex and well-thought-out mining system, and more than a hundred random events in the search and confrontation with the aggressive environment of the anomalous world of the Zone.
‚ò¢ More than 100 different types of weapons, armor, helmets, backpacks and costumes, including legendary and mythical items!
games.howToPlayText:
PC control: Left mouse click to interact with game elements. –úouse wheel to scroll lists.
Management on a mobile device: Touch to interact with game elements.

games.title: We Are In A Simulation Simulator
games.description:
SIMON SAYS , COMPLY OR DIE!

A brain wrecking, monkey see , monkey do game.
Your only chance of survival is to follow the crowd. Any unwanted action will be punished.
games.howToPlayText:
Someone is pulling our strings.
The key to survival is copying exactly what the others are doing, and not questioning anything.

W-A-S-D for movement
C for crouching
Space for jumping
P to pause

Are you ready to obey?

games.title: Laser Survivor
games.description:
Laser Survivor, a cyberpunk roguelike action-adventure set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse, the last hope for humanity rests in the hands of five heroes fighting hordes of demons pouring through a dimensional rift. Featuring pixel art visuals, randomized weapons, chiptune soundtracks, and relentless survival gameplay, every run is a test of adaptation and skill.

Story
The world has fallen. A dimensional rift has unleashed an unstoppable flood of demons, tearing through what remains of civilization. But from the chaos, five warriors rise. Each wielding unique powers forged for survival in this cyberpunk hellscape. Dropped at random into corrupted maps, they must adapt with whatever weapons and passive abilities they find, carving their path through waves of enemies, unlocking upgrades, and uncovering the truth behind the rift. The fate of Earth depends on them.

Heroes
Blaze: Fires homing bullets that lock onto the nearest enemy, ensuring no demon can escape.
Neon: Projects a protective energy shield that damages anything foolish enough to get close.
Hunter: Drops explosives that create deadly zones, controlling the battlefield with traps.
Slash: Slices enemies apart with razor-sharp horizontal cuts that pierce entire hordes.
Jaxx: A cyber-brute with massive, scaling area damage, crushing everything in his path.


Features
Cyberpunk Roguelike Gameplay: Every run is unique, with randomized spawn points, weapons, and abilities.
5 Maps to Conquer: Battle through the Lab, Forest, Crypt, Factory, and Dungeon, each swarming with demon hordes.
10 Active Weapons & 10 Passive Abilities: Build your arsenal on the fly as you adapt to randomized loadouts.
8 Missions & 11 Upgrades: Progress through challenging missions, earn permanent upgrades, and unlock new survival tactics.
Collectibles & Lore: Discover secrets that reveal the origins of the rift and the story behind the invasion.
Retro Pixel Art: Neon-infused visuals with hand-crafted pixel art and gameplay by the Felicity team.
80s Chiptune Soundtrack: Pulsating tracker music by Drozerix, driving the action with nostalgic energy.

Why Play Laser Survivor?
Fast-paced roguelike survival set in a sci-fi cyberpunk apocalypse.
Play as five unique heroes, each with distinct base abilities and upgrade paths.
Endless replayability with randomized runs and evolving builds.
Perfect for fans of pixel art shooters, bullet-hell roguelikes, and retro-inspired chiptune soundtracks.

Laser Survivor is more than survival. It‚Äôs humanity‚Äôs last stand in a cyberpunk post-apocalypse. Will you master the chaos, close the rift, and save the world... or be consumed by the demons?
games.howToPlayText: Arrow keys, or WASD for movement of the characters with keyboard, or Mouse. Touch controls on Mobile for movement of the characters.
